title: iseewhatyousay for Wear
summary: The revolutionary iseewhatyousay now on Android Wear!
description: The revolutionary iseewhatyousay now on Wear!After installing, all you have to do is flip the watch toward the speaker. The watch will turn the speech into text and vibrate. Flip the watch back over to see what they said. Repeat for a fluid conversation.
descriptionHTML:
The revolutionary iseewhatyousay now on Wear!

After installing, all you have to do is flip the watch toward the speaker. The watch will turn the speech into text and vibrate. Flip the watch back over to see what they said. Repeat for a fluid conversation.
comments: Simply Awesome! I have a Samsung Galaxy S5 & just bought the Samsung WEAR LIVE Smartwatch,  and TRUE to Alex's email:  This application WORKS üëçüëèüëå
